full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/4/2023 10 Rs. DR Grd POT. 10RS TEN 2lld ORIGINAL 150 AFFIDAVIT OF MARRIAGE We, (1) Dalichand Bhagwanji Shah, aged about 88 years, and (2) Gamanlal Kesurchand Shah, aged about 8.7 years, obth are Jain Bania by caste, both are resident of Mahuwa, Taluka Mahuwa, Dist. Surat, India both do hereby solemnly declare on oath as under :-. That we know one Maganlal son of Kashanchand Dalichand Shah of Mahuwa, Taluka Mahuwa, Dist. Surat, India. The above said Maganlal WAX son of Kashanchand Dalichand Shah was legally married with one Savitaben daughter of Manekchand Nanchand Shah of Karchelia, Taluka Mahuwa, Dist. Surat, India 6 The marriage of the above said Maganlal son of Kashanchand Dalichand Shah with the above said Savitaben daughter ofManekchand Nanchand Shah took place at Karchelia, Taluka Mahuwa, Dist. Surat, India on 4th May, 1943 . And hence from 4th May, 1943 the above said Maganlal son of Kashanchand Dalichand Shah is the legally married husband of the above said Savitaben daughter of Manekchand Nanchand Shah and similarry from 4th May, 1943 the above said Savitaben daughter of Manekchand Nanchand Shah is the legally married wife of the above said Maganlal son of Kashanchand Dalichand Shah. And the said marriage is still subsisting 0 We being of the same caste and of the same village and having close relation with the said family know the above fact of (P.T.O.).
